name: Parting
description:
Oh great, more youngsters on my lawn. I ain’t got no candy for you kids so scram! Huh? You’re here for a story? Well...thinking about this story really gives back pain. Fine, gather around, I’ll tell ya a story. A story that takes place on a night similar to this one. 

Halloween night, my friends and I sneaked into an rickety old house and found ourselves facing supernatural obstacles. However, the biggest obstacle of all was my attitude. Will I save those who I love? Or will I be haunted by my past forever?

Now that you know the characters, let me begin-. Wait, they made our story a game? Oh great! Now you don’t have to listen to me yammer on about it. What are you waiting for, download the game!

Credits:

Director: Lancer

Assistant: Joseph Orr

Writers: Lancer, Shining Door God

Character Artist: GuntherGooms

Background Artist: Appledud45

Sound Effects from Zapsplat

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
